fields.name: ace_event_number
fields.title: ACE event number
fields.description: unique number of equipment deployment or sample collection from ACE

fields.name: ace_sample_number_csp
fields.title: ACE sample number CSP
fields.description: unique sample code from ACE, formatted as follows: shipname/ACE/legnumber/projectnumber/julianday[UTC]/eventnumber/PIinitials/projectsampleID

fields.name: start_datetime
fields.title: Start date time
fields.description: date and time at which the underway seawater sample was collected or the CTD deployment began, in ISO8601 format YYYY-MM-DDTHhh:mm:ss+00:00 [UTC]

fields.name: start_latitude
fields.title: Start latitude
fields.description: latitude of underway seawater sample collection or start of CTD deployment [degree_north]
fields.x_spi_cf_attribute: latitude of underway seawater sample collection or start of CTD deployment

fields.name: start_longitude
fields.title: Start longitude
fields.description: longitude of underway seawater sample collection or start of CTD deployment [degree_east]
fields.x_spi_cf_attribute: longitude of underway seawater sample collection or start of CTD deployment

fields.name: end_datetime
fields.title: End date time
fields.description: date and time at which a CTD deployment ended, in ISO8601 format YYYY-MM-DDTHhh:mm:ss+00:00 [UTC]

fields.name: end_latitude
fields.title: End latitude
fields.description: latitude of end of CTD deployment [degree_north]
fields.x_spi_cf_attribute: latitude of end of CTD deployment

fields.name: end_longitude
fields.description: longitude of end of CTD deployment [degree_east]
fields.x_spi_cf_attribute: longitude of end of CTD deployment

fields.name: sampling_method
fields.title: Sampling method
fields.description: method by which seawater sample was collected

fields.name: sampling_depth (m)
fields.title: Sampling depth
fields.description: depth from which seawater sample was collected [m]
fields.x_spi_cf_attribute: depth from which seawater sample was collected

fields.name: CSP (µg BSA eq/L)
fields.title: average CSP concentration
fields.description: average of Coomassie Stainable Particle concentration determined by spectrophotometry in duplicate sea water samples [µg BSA eq/L]

fields.name: CSP standard error (µg BSA eq/L)
fields.title: standard error of average CSP concentration
fields.description: standard error of Coomassie Stainable Particle concentration in duplicate samples calculated as σ/sqrt(n), where σ is the standard deviation and n is the number of samples [µg BSA eq/L]
